description: Added the chorus claps and started writing the lyrics

description: To make the tab easier to play through, I copied all the slap parts into the fingered bass track, so you can play through the entire song without having to change tracks. I also marked with text the slaps and pops so it shows, and fixed the staccato notes to play in Songsterr.
title: Can't Stop

description:
Thanks for the error reports. Here are my changes:

Drums:

- Notation issues in drums fixed
- Changed toms around

Guitar:

- Removed dead notes from verses. It's still played the way I originally notated it, but I figured it's easier to read this way.

Vocals

- Changed vocal instrument to saxophone
title: Can't Stop
